solution_line_template: If the number of female adults was {female_more_than_male} more than the males, then there were {male_adults}+{female_more_than_male} = <<{male_adults}+{female_more_than_male}={female_adults}>>{female_adults} females.
The total number of adults is {female_adults}+{male_adults} = <<{female_adults}+{male_adults}={total_adults}>>{total_adults}
The children were twice the total number of adults, thus {children_multiplier}*{total_adults} = <<{children_multiplier}*{total_adults}={total_children}>>{total_children}
The total number of people at the family reunion is {total_children}+{total_adults} = <<{total_children}+{total_adults}={total_people}>>{total_people}
